description: This Jerk chicken stir-fry is a Jamaican twist on the traditional Asian stir-fry combining spicy Jerk seasoning with wok-fried chicken and veggies. On the table in just 20 minutes, this is a quick and easy dish.
name: Jerk Chicken & Capsicum Stir-fry Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a large deep frying pan. Add the chicken drumsticks and capsicums and fry over a high heat for 5 minutes, turning occasionally. Add the sugar snap peas, mango, lime juice and stock and bring to the boil. Reduce the heat and cover and simmer for 15 minutes, turning the chicken occasionally until cooked through. Serve with rice.

Serve with rice.
